text: WRLW-CD is a low-powered digital television station that is licensed to and located in Salem, Indiana. The station, which is owned by Rebecca L. White, broadcasts its digital signal on UHF channel 41 (virtual channel 17 via PSIP). ==Programming== The station provides local and regional news as well as Southern Indiana focused high school and college sports. WRLW-CD carries a game of the week broadcast of Mid-Southern Conference and Patoka Athletic Conference basketball and football as well as partnering with the Indiana High School Athletic Association for post season contests. The station also has exclusive rights from Learfield Sports to broadcast the audio from Indiana University sports and Purdue University Sports (via audio feed from WSLM and WSLM-FM) to the Louisville market via the WRLW TV channels. Other local programming will include Coffee Club, Coach's Corner, Breaking News and news from schools in Washington County. ===Digital channel=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Channel ! Video ! Aspect !
